about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my background, skills, and passion for creating amazing web experiences.

story.paragraph1: I'm a passionate web developer with expertise in modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I love creating user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.
story.paragraph2: With a background in both frontend and backend development, I enjoy working on full-stack projects that challenge me to learn and grow as a developer.
story.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each one represents a unique challenge and learning experience.

bds.title: Management Site for Code Migration
bds.description: A comprehensive web platform designed to streamline and manage code migration processes with automated workflows and project tracking.

sc.title: Code Migration Desktop Tool
sc.description: A powerful desktop application built for efficient code migration with real-time monitoring and automated deployment capabilities.

case.title: Personal Portfolio
case.description: A personal website designed to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences. It's a simple and clean website that is easy to navigate and understand.
